description.attr1: Repairs and replaces ship components necessary to fully operate and own a 'acquired' ship.
Before this overhaul 'acquired' ships cannot be upgraded.
During the 'acquisition' process, the un-sympathetic security forces' resistance to new ownership tends to cause damage.
Even if said damage is avoided, some systems need to be replaced to ensure security and compatibility.
Due to the usually 'less than legal' nature of the 'acquisition' this upgrade tends to be costly and only available in 'less than legal' locations.
